TopicTitle: Kerbal, Steam and xbox 360 Controller, any help-guide?

Articles.Content:
Hello, today i decided to fix my controller with Kerbal....but its not easy as i remembered.

Do you know how, or any guide to help a bit.

For example i want my triggers to incrementally increase/decrease thrust,

few months ago i for sure remember fixing all of these ingame, but now everytime i try ingame when i change inputs it doesnt

recognize the buttons i click and one weird thing, while i am trying to select input i see behind the controller, controlling the menus in Kerbal.

I tried messing around with right clicking on Kerbal on steam and Manager->Controller settings but it feels so clunky.

Any help would be appreciated, this is the second time i fail on this quest 

Edited August 19, 2020 by Boyster

Ok, i think i fixed it,

I selected from Steam->Kerbal->Right Click->Manage->Controller Configuration

then

Browse Configs at the bottom of the Menu->Templates->Gamepad->Apply Configuration

After that you can open Kerbal and bind whatever you want from the ingame Input Settings and not have to deal with Steam configuration weirdness.

First unwanted behavior, the D-Pad you must change it to Button Pad(from steam) and assign some keyboard inputs to work.

Second thing, i had to increase from ingame menu the Dead Zone to some Axis 0.20, maybe even more or less, dunno didnt do enough testing.
